description: Keep up to date on the latest scores from every PGA TOUR event throughout the season.  Ask Alexa for the latest leaderboard or get the score of your favorite player.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask PGA TOUR for the leaderboard.
Alexa, ask PGA TOUR how Jason Day is doing.
Alexa, ask PGA TOUR for the FedExCup Standings.
name: PGA TOUR
shortDescription: Get up to the minute scores and player standings from every PGA TOUR event
